typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct WeightedPoolParams memory,struct WeightedPoolSettingsParams memory,address,bytes32) external returns (address)

documentation.text: @notice returns a list of pools under management by this controller

@notice Returns the pools Id
 @param poolAddress - Pool to get the Id for

params.poolAddress: - Address of pool being worked on.

params.isMustAllowlistLPs: - List of LP's allowed in the pool
params.isSwapEnabledOnStart: - Whether swaps are enabled straight away
params.name: - Pool name
params.salt: - Salt used towards calculating pool address
